content.question: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, a moving cart on a horizontal track is at position <math alttext="0.5 meter" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></math>. Using a motion detector, students generate a graph of the cart’s velocity as a function of time, as shown above. skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
